triples.name: Bacteria
triples.relevance: The paper studies bacterial species and their interactions, which is the core focus of the research.

triples.name: Competition (biology)
triples.relevance: The paper investigates competition between bacterial species as the fundamental ecological process being studied.

triples.name: Antibiotic
triples.relevance: Antibiotics are discussed as the conventional approach to bacterial infection treatment that the paper proposes to supplement with competition-based alternatives.

triples.name: Antimicrobial resistance
